channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1254; 05:20PM; 2700 W Wilshire Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Kj1D80; Westlake; KNOCKDOWN: The first arriving fire companies(24 firefighters) located content fires in more than one room on both the 1st and 2nd floors and extinguished them in 23 minutes. The Incident Commander requested LAFD Arson to respond for the investigation. Firefighters are conducting a thorough search of the building and there are no injuries reported at this time. No further details.; FS 11; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC11 BC5 CM20 CM22 E11 E13 E20 E211 E220 E29 E6 EM1 EM11 RA11 RA13 RA29 RA811 SQ21 T11 T20 T29; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1254; 04:57PM; 2700 W Wilshire Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Kj1D80; Westlake; Two story, commercial building (vacant) with smoke showing from the 2nd floor. Firefighters are in the offensive mode. Two additional task forces requested. (not reflected in this alert).; FS 11; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC11 E11 E13 E211 RA11 RA13 RA811 SQ21 T11; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

Fall (Long) - FATALITY; INC#0919; 02:14PM; Eb 10 Fy; MAP: https://bit.ly/3ZYqLHd; Boyle Heights; Firefighters determined death of an adult male patient who (based on witness report to LAPD) jumped from the EB101 to 10 Freeway overpass. The 9-1-1 call was received at 1:44PM. Any media queries are directed to LAPD Hollenbeck Division Inc# 2533 ; FS 2; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; E2 RA2 RA25; CH4; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0191; 04:12AM; 1732 S Crenshaw Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/403et0k; Arlington Heights; The first arriving 30 firefighters (additional units still enroute) extinguished the fire in 15 minutes with no injuries reported. Firefighters contained the fire to the unit of origin, preventing the fire from extending to any of the adjacent units. A search of the unit was clear. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details. ; FS 68; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 10; BC1 BC11 BC18 CM20 CM22 E13 E15 E203 E226 E229 E26 E294 E34 E5 E68 EM1 EM11 EM9 HR3 RA26 RA34 RA68 RA826 T26 T29 T3 T94 UR3 UR88; CH9; 13 15; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0191; 04:12AM; 1732 S Crenshaw Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/403et0k; Arlington Heights; Three story, garden-style apartment building with fire in one unit on the 2nd floor. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 68; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 10; BC1 BC11 BC18 CM20 CM22 E13 E15 E203 E226 E229 E26 E294 E34 E5 E68 EM1 EM11 EM9 HR3 RA26 RA34 RA68 RA826 T26 T29 T3 T94 UR3 UR88; CH9; 13 15; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1178; 05:50PM; 15707 W Roxford St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3mnaqhi; Sylmar; KNOCKDOWN: 18 firefighters extinguished the fire in 17 minutes with no injuries reported. They contained the fire to the detached garage with neither the single family dwelling to the front or the unit to the rear sustaining damage. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 91; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 E275 E75 E91 RA91 T75; CH8; 17; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1178; 05:33PM; 15707 W Roxford St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3mnaqhi; Sylmar; One story, detached garage well involved in fire. Firefighters are defending the single family dwelling to the front from damage while fire attack is in the offensive mode. It is unknown at this time if it is a converted garage. ; FS 91; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 E275 E75 E91 RA91 T75; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

Hiker Rescue - Hoist Op; INC#0593; 10:33AM; 2698 N Commonwealth Ave; MAP: https://bit.ly/3KvgXPk; Griffith Park; LAFD Air Ops located the patient and lowered an aeromedic to assess her. The 43yo female hiker has a non-life threatening lower extremity injury. Due to the location and terrain, a hoist operation will be used to retrieve and then transport the patient. The 9-1-1 call was received at 33AM. No further details.; FS 35; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; BC5 E235 E35 H4 H5 HA4 HA5 RA35 RA835 RH114 T35; CH7; 15; Margaret Stewart

Update Structure Fire - FATALITY; INC#0432; 09:53AM; 8038 S Alverstone Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3zKqnkJ; Westchester; After an extensive search in the structure with excessive storage conditions, firefighters located the deceased remains of (presumed) adult male. Building type is updated: it is a garage to the rear of a single family dwelling and it has a small, attached occupancy. An adult male was believed to be in the unit and was unaccounted for upon fire extinguishment. Due to the amount of storage, it took a significant amount of overhaul to permit a search of the occupancy. LAFD Arson is responding (per protocol) for the investigation and there are no further details available at this time. ; FS 5; Batt 4; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC4 E205 E5 E51 E67 RA95 T5; CH7; 13; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0432; 08:53AM; 8042 S Alverstone Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3nZUKRP; Westchester; KNOCKDOWN: 18 firefighters extinguished the fire in 30 minutes with no injuries reported. The fire was contained to the garage. Firefighters will be on scene for approximately two hours conducting overhaul due to excessive storage conditions. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 5; Batt 4; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC4 E205 E51 E67 RA95 T5; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart
